title: The Most Hated Man on the Internet
description:
Tig and Cheryl talk about Netflix's new true crime docuseries, "The Most Hated Man on The Internet". Tig talks about her recuperation from COVID, Cheryl gives up-dates on her life changes, and much more!


*this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

  • Follow the show:
  • Instagram: @tigandcheryltruestory
  • Twitter: @TandCTrueStory
